items.sentence: Tom's birthday is exactly three months after mine.
Writing French is more difficult than speaking it.
Tom watched the garbage men take away the garbage.
Spices such as cloves came from the Spice Islands.
Tom happened to let out the secret to his friends.
Tom may have missed the train. He hasn't come yet.
In case you need to leave, let us know beforehand.
Do you think that anyone would care if I did that?
Do you think that Tom is still worried about that?
Tom didn't think Mary would get the better of him.
Tom didn't think his boss's plan was a viable one.
I suppose I'm going to have to teach you a lesson.
I don't know whether this'll be of any use to you.
I went on vacation, and my plants are still alive.
You won't be able to hide from the police forever.
I'm a grouch before I have my first cup of coffee.
You could tell that Tom and Mary liked each other.
He who justifies himself too much accuses himself.
It's not just Tom and Mary who have made mistakes.
Tom has always looked after his cars fastidiously.
